alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 10 at 4:21PM AKST until December 11 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON AKST MONDAY ALONG THE RICHARDSON HIGHWAY FROM THE EDGERTON HIGHWAY JUNCTION SOUTH TO THOMPSON PASS...... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, with local amounts up to 30 inches possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Copper River Basin, along the Richardson Highway from the Edgerton Highway south to Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop this evening then intensify tonight. The heaviest snow is expected overnight tonight through Monday morning. Additional snow accumulation is likely Monday afternoon through Tuesday, but confidence is low for how much additional accumulation there will be. This warning may need to be extended.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
